devdoc.author: Jayce Azua
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

createChallenge(string).author: Jayce Azua
createChallenge(string).details: simply increments the count of the challenges

toggleCompleted(uint256).author: Jayce Azua
toggleCompleted(uint256).details: toggles true and false if the challenge is marked as completed
toggleCompleted(uint256).return: nothing simply marks off the challenge to completed or not

devdoc.title: Military Coin Check - Challenge Coins

createChallenge(string).notice: creates a smart contract for the challenges and increments the count each time it is created

toggleCompleted(uint256).notice: toggles and checks off the challenge that was completed

userdoc.notice: This contact is for internal use only. Only possible way to use this contract is by purchasing challenge coins
